content: crochet house pattern crochet terms us magic_ring slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain stitch single_crochet single_crochet 2sc in 1st 2 single_crochet in 1 stitch 2sctog 2 single_crochet together 3sctog 3 single_crochet together 1sc 2ch 1sc in 1stitch double_crochet double_crochet 1 crochet house size 2 4 6 cm x 2 4 6 cm tools - hook 2 mm - scissors - yarn needle - button - 1 piece yarn and colors used yarn alize bella made in turkey 100% cotton 50 grams - 197 yards 180 meters for houses yarn color 488 yellow color 56 red color 158 lilac color 165 light green color 83 orange for embroidery yarn color 455 green color 165 light green color 158 lilac color 333 dark blue color 56 red notes you can experiment with yarn thickness hook number yarn composition and color but the final size will be different 2 crochet house diagram we use yarn a and hook number 2 row 1 12ch 11sc row 2 1ch 11sc row 3 1ch 11sc row 4 1ch 11sc 3 row 5 3ch 2dc 2ch 1dc after 2 stitches row 6 3ch 2dc 2ch 1dc after 2 stitches 2ch 3dc after 2 stitches 2ch 3dc after 2 stitches after 2 stitches row 7 1ch 11sc row 8 1ch 2sctog 7sc 2sctog row 9 1ch 2sctog 5sc 2sctog row 10 1ch 2sctog 3sc 2sctog row 11 1ch 2sctog 1sc 2sctog row 12 1ch 3sctog cut the yarn crochet a roof join to row 7 photo 1 3ch and 2dc in 1st photo 2 5dc photo 3 2dc+2ch+2dc in 1st photo 4 5 5dc photo 6 2dc in 1st 3ch 1sl st in the same stitch photo 7 cut the yarn 4 embroider the grass photo 1 2 embroider flowers pull the yarn to the front side photo 3 wrap the needle 2 times photo 4 insert the needle into the same point photo 5 6 embroider flowers in random order photo 7 sew on a button photo 8 end happy crochet i will always be happy to answer your questions regards and best wishes tatiana creator of the store tatycrochetstore 5
